about_the_game:
Spanning 53 tracks in two volumes, A Total War Saga: TROY Original Soundtrack represents a shift in musical direction for the BAFTA-winning Total War developer Creative Assembly.
 
With the combined goal of depicting the herculean battles of the Bronze Age that bring immortal fame (‘Kleos’), and to pay respect (‘Timē’) to the gods, the nature and the fallen, the sound of the Ancient Aegean is reimagined for a modern game-playing audience.
 
Audio director Richard Beddow and his team crafted an experience drenched in stylised atmosphere, pulsing textures and world instrument colours, embracing new and old technology in a vibrant fusion not seen before in a Total War title.
